channel.title: bash on Oh The Huge Manatee!
channel.description: Recent content in bash on Oh The Huge Manatee!

item.title: Some git log magic
item.description: Today I got to generate git statistics for my team. It’s more fun than it sounds! First of all, it’s always entertaining to learn just how flexible git’s reporting can get. Secondly, it’s a chance to dive back into my old sysadmin tool kit and play with awk, sed, and friends. There were a few questions I wanted to answer about one particular developer’s input. I’m concerned that he is working too much after hours.
